updated, changed so `cancel_with_status` is a generic ruby method.

PTAL

The previous test runs failed on issue #12002. Re-running tests since https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/12005 is merged.

jenkins: test this please

test failures:
* interop PR (on jenkins) - https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/10686, https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/10390
A heads up that I found an error within one of the new tests - currently revising two of the added tests in `client_stub_spec.rb`

sorry for some post-review changes:

there were a couple of flakey-test failures that last commit fixes:
* turning on and off `Thread.abort_on_exception` was racey since the write-loop thread doesn't get joined if there's an error (made client-side bidi calls swallow exceptions and only rely on `cancel_with_status`
* new tests in `client_stub_spec` called `create_server` more than once - so servers could stay listening for too long
* changed new tests so that test-client reads first and then writes, to make sure the call was started on the server

PTAL

squashed both commits (trivial squash, no conflicts), waiting for tests to re-run

jenkins: test this please
